alert.note: Alert for Pembina (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 4:16PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Pembina County through 445 PM CDT... At 415 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Neche, or 37 miles north of Grafton, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Neche, Hamilton, Bathgate and Leroy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
